entries.pageTwoDescription:
Cruiser Black was launched in late 2003 after the huge success of Vodka Cruiser. Cruiser Black combines the iconic Cruiser brand name with premium triple distilled vodka and a higher ABV of 6.5% culminating in a top shelf unisex product. 

Available in Raspberry, Lemon Lime & Bitters, Citrus and Ice (Exclusive to Dan Murphy. 
Taste the flavour!
